publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1948# Roseanna Cunningham: 21st Century City of Courtesy—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Perth on being the first Scottish community to be awarded the title 21st Century City of Courtesy by the Campaign for Courtesy; notes the importance of tourism and service industries to the Perth economy, and hopes that many more Scottish towns and cities will follow the courteous lead that Perth has shown. Supported by: Mr John Swinney*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*

S2M-1948# 21st Century City of Courtesy (lodged on 3 November 2004) Bruce Crawford*, Jim Mather*, Alex Neil*, Brian Adam*, Richard Lochhead*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Eleanor Scott*, Robin Harper*, Murdo Fraser*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr David Davidson*, Michael Matheson*, Nora Radcliffe*

S2M-1948# Roseanna Cunningham: 21st Century City of Courtesy—That the Parliament congratulates the people of Perth on being the first Scottish community to be awarded the title 21st Century City of Courtesy by the Campaign for Courtesy; notes the importance of tourism and service industries to the Perth economy, and hopes that many more Scottish towns and cities will follow the courteous lead that Perth has shown. Supported by: Mr John Swinney, Mr Adam Ingram, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mr Bruce McFee, Ms Sandra White, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Bruce Crawford, Jim Mather, Alex Neil, Brian Adam, Richard Lochhead, Rob Gibson, Mr Mark Ruskell, Eleanor Scott, Robin Harper, Murdo Fraser, Donald Gorrie, Mr David Davidson, Michael Matheson, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-1948# 21st Century City of Courtesy (lodged on 3 November 2004) Linda Fabiani*
